text:
Teamwire | Technical Support Engineer | Düsseldorf | Remote

We are a strongly growing European startup. Teamwire is a secure enterprise messaging app and solves the Whatsapp problem of businesses.

We are hiring a technical support engineer with Linux, Docker and Ansible skills. Ideally the person is based in Düsseldorf, Aschaffenburg or Munich, but remote is possible.

The full profile can be found here: https://www.teamwire.eu/assets/Uploads/Technical-Support-Eng...

Please contact us via www.teamwire.eu and join our team!
